thread.section_title: Crosby Street Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice experience
thread.title_full: Nice experience - Review of Crosby Street Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sjberg
title: Nice experience
text:
Very cozy, nice place. Location is great, and not too noisy.
Room as well as the entire hotel is beautifully decorated and has a personal touch. Breakfast was at the top; I enjoyed hotel's afternoon tea- it looked quite popular, but not overcrowded.Outside area is particularly nice- just to relax in the fresh air. Staff is always polite and very friendly, having great attention to details. Will definitely come back.
